abstract: MySpace is about to open up its platform and give developers a set of tools with which to build applications that can run, and make money, on its site.
snippet: MySpace is about to open up its platform and give developers a set of tools with which to build applications that can run, and make money, on its site.
lead_paragraph: MySpace is about to join Facebook, Bebo, Meebo and so many other stars in the Web 2.0 firmament in opening up its platform and giving developers a set of tools with which to build applications that can run, and make money, on its site.

headline.main: Zombies and Scrabble Knock-Offs to Invade MySpace
